mapper.select: SELECT kid_nm as kidNm, iclass, gender, profile, birth , address, memo, emer_nm as emerNm, emer_nb as emerNb , code FROM t_kid WHERE ikid = #{ikid}
SELECT a.iparent, a.uid, a.parent_nm as parentNm , a.phone_nb as phoneNb, a.irelation FROM t_parent a JOIN t_parent_kid b ON a.iparent = b.iparent WHERE b.ikid = #{ikid}
SELECT kid_nm as kidNm, birth, gender, iclass , address , profile, state, date(created_at) as createdAt , emer_nm as emerNm, emer_nb as emerNb, memo FROM t_kid WHERE ikid = #{ikid}
mapper.delete: DELETE b, c, d, e, f, g, h FROM t_kid a left JOIN t_parent_kid b ON a.ikid = b.ikid left JOIN t_growth c ON a.ikid = c.ikid left JOIN t_body d ON a.ikid = d.ikid left JOIN t_grade e ON a.ikid = e.ikid left JOIN t_notice_board f ON a.ikid = f.ikid left JOIN t_notice_pics g ON f.inotice = g.inotice left JOIN t_notice_comment h ON f.inotice = h.inotice WHERE YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - 13 >= YEAR(a.birth)
DELETE FROM t_kid WHERE YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - 13 >= YEAR(birth)
